max: t0-u;

t2 <= u;
u <= t0;

F2s2t0 <= F2s0u;

//arrival delay 
F2s0u - F2s0t1_2 <= 4.003523100328289 * u - 4.003523100328289 * t1_2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F2s0u - F2s0t2 <= 4.003523100328289 * u - 4.003523100328289 * t2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F2s0t0 - F2s0u <= 4.003523100328289 * t0 - 4.003523100328289 * u + 0.004605170185988091;

//time
t1_2 <= t2;
t2 <= t0;

//flow 1
//sw 9
//sw 10
//sw 0
F1s0t1_2 <= F1s0t2;
F1s0t2 <= F1s0t0;

//arrival 1
F1s0t0 - F1s0t2 <= 5.99592277251469 * t0 - 5.99592277251469 * t2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F1s0t0 - F1s0t1_2 <= 5.99592277251469 * t0 - 5.99592277251469 * t1_2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F1s0t2 - F1s0t1_2 <= 5.99592277251469 * t2 - 5.99592277251469 * t1_2 + 0.004605170185988091;

//flow 2
//sw 1
F2s1t1_2 <= F2s1t2;
F2s0t1_2 = F2s1t1_2;
F2s1t2 <= F2s0t2;
//sw 2
F2s2t2 <= F2s2t0;
F2s1t2 = F2s2t2;
F2s2t0 <= F2s0t0;
//sw 0
F2s0t1_2 <= F2s0t2;
F2s0t2 <= F2s0t0;

//arrival 2
F2s0t0 - F2s0t2 <= 4.003523100328289 * t0 - 4.003523100328289 * t2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F2s0t0 - F2s0t1_2 <= 4.003523100328289 * t0 - 4.003523100328289 * t1_2 + 0.004605170185988091;
F2s0t2 - F2s0t1_2 <= 4.003523100328289 * t2 - 4.003523100328289 * t1_2 + 0.004605170185988091;

//servers
F2s1t2 - F2s1t1_2 >= 21.666666666666664 * t2 - 21.666666666666664 * t1_2 - 0.019780544180732544;
F2s2t0 - F2s2t2 >= 12.5 * t0 - 12.5 * t2 - 0.27995426193989514;
